CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(CurrencyIsoCode,"CAD"),"CA10 - Canada", IF(ISPICKVAL( Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c ,"Autofuser"),"US10 - Arrow International", IF(ISPICKVAL( Education_Record__r.Primary_Product__c ,"EZ-IO"),"US60 - Teleflex LLC", "US30 - Arrow International" )))
CustomField.label: Company Code
